snippet.title: Valfaris: Mecha Therion Release Date Trailer!
snippet.description:
We are PUMPED to announce you will be able to rip the galaxy a new wormhole (again) on November 21st when Valfaris: Mecha Therion launches on Steam & GOG! More news on a console release early 2024!
Follow us on Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/BigSugarGames
Wishlist on steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1647920/Valfaris_Mecha_Therion/
